title: Slow Cooker Applesauce Chicken
directions: + Place the chicken in the slow cooker first, then add the applesauce and spices. Cover and cook on low for 7 hours or until chicken is done.

I always feel silly posting these “recipes”. I mean, there isn’t much to it! I guess I’m just offering cooking for the non-cooks, but everyone always seems to love an easy, quick, simple dish! Plus, the slow cooker just magically transforms chicken. So here are some words or wisdom: when in chicken-doubt, throw it in the slow cooker!
ingredients: + 2 Cups of Unsweetened Organic Applesauce (homemade would be awesome!)
